Class SimulationRunDao

java.lang.Object
ORM.dao.SimulationRunDao
public class SimulationRunDao extends Object
Data Access Object for SimulationRun and its related entities.

Provides methods to persist, find, and delete simulation runs along with their associated distribution configurations, service point results, and application logs.

      public SimulationRunDao()

  • Method Details

    • persist

      public void persist(SimulationRun run, List<DistConfig> configs, List<SPResult> spResults, List<ApplicationLog> logs)
      Persist a SimulationRun and its associated entities atomically.

      Links DistConfig, SPResult, and ApplicationLog entities to the parent simulation run before persisting.

      Parameters:
      run - the simulation run to persist
      configs - distribution configurations related to the run
      spResults - service point results related to the run
      logs - application logs related to the run
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if persistence fails

    • find

      public SimulationRun find(Long id)
      Find a SimulationRun by its ID.

      Ensures that all related collections are loaded.

      Parameters:
      id - the primary key of the simulation run
      Returns:
      the SimulationRun, or null if not found

    • findAll

      public List<SimulationRun> findAll()
      Retrieve all SimulationRun entities, ordered by timestamp descending.
      Returns:
      list of all simulation runs

    • findAllWithAssociations

      public List<SimulationRun> findAllWithAssociations()
      Retrieve all SimulationRun entities along with their associated DistConfig entities.
      Returns:
      list of simulation runs with distributions fetched

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(Long id)
      Delete a SimulationRun by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the primary key of the simulation run to delete
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if deletion fails
